:root{--banner__background:#fffdf1}:root{--banner__border:#f2eeb5}.banner{font-size:.8666666667rem;font-weight:400;line-height:1.2rem;background-color:#fffdf1;background-color:var(--banner__background);border:1px solid #f2eeb5;border:1px solid var(--banner__border);border-radius:.5333333333rem;padding:.5333333333rem}
.page-root{-webkit-box-flex:1;-webkit-flex:1 0 auto;-moz-box-flex:1;-ms-flex:1 0 auto;flex:1 0 auto;-webkit-transition:opacity 150ms cubic-bezier(0.785, 0.135, 0.15, 0.86);transition:opacity 150ms cubic-bezier(0.785, 0.135, 0.15, 0.86)}.page-hide .page-root{opacity:0}.page-show .page-root{opacity:1}.page-root--container{position:relative}.page-root__static-banner{display:none}.no-js .page-root__static-banner{margin-top:1.0666666667rem;margin-bottom:1.0666666667rem;display:block}
